reqs: Pre-reqs: One of EECE 331, ELEC 371 and one of EECE 360, ELEC 341 and one of EECE 269, ELEC 221, EECE 359 and one of CPSC 260, CPSC 259 and one of STAT 251, MATH 318, MATH 302, STAT 302.
description: Data acquisition, time and frequency domain analysis, analog and discrete filter design, sampling theory, time-dependent processing, linear prediction, random signals, biomedical system modeling, and stability analysis; introduction to nonlinear systems.
